insert:
SELECT SEQ_TEST_TEACHER.NEXTVAL AS teacherId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TEST_TEACHER ( TEACHER_ID, TEACHER_NAME, TEACHER_AGE, TEACHER_BIRTH ) VALUES( #teacherId#, #teacherName#, #teacherAge#, #teacherBirth# )
update:
UPDATE TEST_TEACHER SET TEACHER_ID = #teacherId#
TEACHER_NAME = #teacherName#
TEACHER_AGE = #teacherAge#
TEACHER_BIRTH = #teacherBirth#
WHERE TEACHER_ID = #teacherId#
select:
SELECT T.TEACHER_ID AS "teacherId", T.TEACHER_NAME AS "teacherName", T.TEACHER_AGE AS "teacherAge", T.TEACHER_BIRTH AS "teacherBirth" FROM TEST_TEACHER T WHERE 1 = 1
T.TEACHER_ID = #teacherId#
T.TEACHER_NAME = #teacherName#
T.TEACHER_AGE = #teacherAge#
T.TEACHER_BIRTH = #teacherBirth#
